questions.question: This hacker, known as 'The Condor', was arrested in 1995 for hacking into dozens of computer networks.
This British hacker was accused of hacking into U.S. military and NASA computers in 2002.
This hacker, known as 'Mafiaboy', was responsible for a series of high-profile DDoS attacks in 2000.
This hacker, known as 'Sabu', was a prominent member of the hacking group LulzSec.
This hacker, known as 'Guccifer', was responsible for a series of high-profile email leaks in 2013.
